ConfigurationOption.Value: select wo.wonum, wo.description, wo.status, wo.persongroup, lbl.laborcode, lbl.lbl_labtransid, wo.jpnum, wo.lbl_wcdcatg_finl, lbl.LBL_WCD_ACK_DATE, lbl.lbl_statusdate, jp.description as jpdesc, jp.lbl_frequency as jp_intended_frequency, wo.onbehalfof, wo.lbl_wkthruid, (Select displayname from person where personid = wo.onbehalfof) onbehalfname, (select phonenum from phone where personid = wo.onbehalfof) behalfphone, (select displayname from person where personid = wo.wo1) requestorname, (select phonenum from phone where personid = wo.wo1) requestorphone, (select to_char( dbms_lob.substr(ldtext,3999) ) from longdescription where ldkey = wo.workorderid and ldownertable = 'WORKORDER' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') ldtext, (select to_char( dbms_lob.substr(ldtext,3999) ) from longdescription where ldkey = (select jobtaskid from jobtask where jpnum = wo.jpnum and jptask = '10' and PLUSCJPREVNUM = (select max(PLUSCJPREVNUM) from jobtask where jpnum = wo.jpnum and jptask = '10')) and ldownertable = 'JOBTASK' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') jtldtext, wo.location, l.description as locdescription, l.lbl_mapcoordinate, (select to_char( dbms_lob.substr(ldtext,3999) )from longdescription where ldkey = l.locationsid and ldownertable = 'LOCATIONS' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') locldtext, wo.assetnum, (select a.description from asset a where a.assetnum = wo.assetnum and a.siteid = wo.siteid) assetdescription, wo.wopriority, wo.origrecordid, wo.origrecordclass, wo.worktype, wo.supervisor, wo.reportdate, wo.glaccount, wo.schedstart, wo.schedfinish, wo.failurecode, wo.problemcode, wo.parent, wo.haschildren, wo.lbl_release_status, wo.LBL_CONDITION_REL, wo.LBL_ESCORT_REQD, wo.WO1, wo.workorderid, wo.siteid, wo.orgid, wo.estdur, wo.crewid, wo.commoditygroup, wo.lbl_destgroup from workorder wo left outer join lbl_labtrans lbl on lbl.refwo = wo.wonum left outer join locations l on (wo.siteid = l.siteid and wo.location = l.location) left outer join jobplan jp on (wo.jpnum = jp.jpnum) where wo.orgid = 'LBNL' and wo.siteid = 'FAC' and wo.historyflag = 0 and (wo.istask = 0 or (wo.istask = 1 and substr(wo.worktype, 1, 2) != 'PM')) and wo.status not in ( 'CAN', 'CLOSE', 'HISTEDIT') and lbl.lbl_status = 'ASSIGN' and lbl.lbl_transtype = 'PLAN'

Struct._value: := localQuery( "Labor Reporting", "Work Order", "'Work Order' = ${Work Order} and 'Craft Person' = ${MX_LABOR_CODE} and 'Finish Time' is null and 'Hours' is null" ) is not null
:= test( ${WCD Acknowledge} is null and (${WCD} == 1 or ${WCD} == 2), ${LBL_BACKGROUND_RED}, null )
:= query( "Failure Codes", "Failure List", " 'Failure Code' = ${Failure Code} and Parent is null ")
:=test(${LBL_REQUIRED_WORKLOG} is not null and ${LBL_WORKLOG_YN} is null, true, false)
:= query("Craft Work Orders", "Work Order", "'Work Order' = ${Work Order} and 'Destination Group' = 'MRO' ")
:= query( "Assignments", "Status", " Person = ${Craft Person} and 'Work Order' = ${Work Order} and 'Trans Type' = 'PLAN' ")
:= query( "Assignments", "LBL_LABTRANSID", " Person = ${Craft Person} and 'Work Order' = ${Work Order} and 'Trans Type' = 'PLAN' ")
:= query( "Images", "RefID", " RefID = ${Work Order} " ) is not null
:= localquery( "Work Orders", "WorkOrderID", " Update == 1 ") is not null
${Craft Status} is not null and ${Craft Person} == ${MX_LABOR_CODE}

ViewField.Name: Failure Code
ViewField.Default: := test( nvl( ${Asset} ) is not null, ${MX_LOOKUP_FAILURECODE_BY_EQUIPMENT}, null )

Struct._value: IsInsert() and ${Failure Code} is not null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please enter the feedback or follow up comment

EventAction.Condition: ${Long Description} is null and ${Work Type} == 'FBACK' and ${Description} like '%Feed Back%'

ConfigurationOption.Value: You have to enter feedback comments

EventAction.Condition: IsModified("WO Status") and ${WO Status} == 'WCOMP' and nvl( ${EMAIL_ON} )

ConfigurationOption.Value: := 'Work Order #' || ${Work Order} || ' has been changed to WCOMP'

THIS IS A TEST.

Work Order #${Work Order} has been changed to WCOMP by ${LOOKUP_DISPLAY_NAME} on ${DS_EDIT_TIME}.

EventAction.Condition: ${WO Status} == 'INPRG' and ${WCD Acknowledge} is null and (${WCD} == 1 or ${WCD} == 2)

ConfigurationOption.Value: [<bg: #ff9> ${Work Order} - ${Description}:] I acknowledge that I have reviewed the hazards with my lead for this work order. A Fire Alarm work order is needed if systems (Halon system, Fire Alarm system, High Sensitivity smoke detectors (HSSDs), Dry Pipe sprinkler system, and EPO switch system) will be touched and/or affected. If Fire Alarm Support Work Order was not planned but is needed with this work order, STOP WORK, contact WPC.

EventAction.Condition: ${WO Status} == 'INPRG' and ${WCD Acknowledge} is null and (${WCD} == 1 or ${WCD} == 2)
${WO Status} == 'INPRG' and ${Original WO Status} != ${WO Status} and ${Walk Through ID} is not null

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please get printed copy of work order ${Work Order} from the lead

EventAction.Condition: ${WO Status} == 'INPRG' and ${WCD Acknowledge} is null and (${WCD} == 1 or ${WCD} == 2)

ConfigurationOption.Value: [<bg: #ff9> ${Work Order} - ${Description}:] I acknowledge that I have reviewed the hazards with my lead for this work order. A Fire Alarm work order is needed if systems (Halon system, Fire Alarm system, High Sensitivity smoke detectors (HSSDs), Dry Pipe sprinkler system, and EPO switch system) will be touched and/or affected. If Fire Alarm Support Work Order was not planned but is needed with this work order, STOP WORK, contact WPC.

EventAction.Condition: true and ${WO Status} == 'INPRG' and ${WCD Acknowledge} is null and (${WCD} == 1 or ${WCD} == 2)

ConfigurationOption.Value: Create a FOLLOWUP, DUPLICATE or FEEDBACK work order?

EventAction.Condition: nvl( ${WO_TYPE} ) is not null and ${Work Order} is null

List.ListEntry: wo.wonum in ( select refwo from lbl_labtrans where lbl_transtype = 'PLAN' and laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' ) and wo.status in ( select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'WOSTATUS' and maxvalue in ('APPR','INPRG') )
